title: TrustPolicy
description: Trust policy v1 stub governing which facts and writers are visible in a given context. Stored as trust-policy:<name> nodes in the WARP graph.

approvedWriters.description: Writer IDs approved to contribute facts under this policy. Relevant when mode=approved-only.

delegations.description: Trust delegation chain declarations. A delegation grants a writer the authority to vouch for other writers.

scope.description: Node prefix glob limiting delegation scope (e.g. 'task:*'). Omit for full scope.

expiresAt.description: ISO 8601 expiry timestamp. Omit for no expiry.
